Zenfully
App

Zenfully App is a Binaural Beats generating web application. It intends to help users concentrate and sleep better. I was brought on the project to work on specific components and functionality.
Visit Site

My Role

I was brought on the project to build out the majority of the application's frontend components and parts of the functionality they controlled. I worked closely with other developers at Motiv Studio to implement my code with their existing framework and functionality.

Technologies

Pug
Scss
Node.js
